# Configuration for module: DVPACKSYS

set( HEADER_FILES 
  include/DVPACKSYS.h
  include/DVPACKSYS_ETypes.h
)

set( SOURCE_FILES 
  src/DVPACKSYS.c
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( DVPACKSYS ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
add_dependencies( DVPACKSYS gucefCORE gucefMT )
target_link_libraries( DVPACKSYS gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( DVPACKSYS PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "DVPACKSYS_BUILD_MODULE" )
GUCEF_config_plugin( DVPACKSYS )

endif( ANDROID )
